title: Hour 3 - Joe Theismann (07-15-20)
itunes:title: Hour 3 - Joe Theismann (07-15-20)
description:
Legendary Washington quarterback Joe Theismann spoke with Dan Patrick about his former franchise's decades-long decision to finally change the 'Redskins' name. Joe says now is the time for change to happen not only in the world but in sports too.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
